snippet: LEAD: The California statute that has temporarily derailed B.A.T. Industries' $4.3 billion takeover bid for Farmers Group Inc. is a little-used law that is likely to create obstacles for other companies seeking to do business in the state, regulat...
lead_paragraph: LEAD: The California statute that has temporarily derailed B.A.T. Industries' $4.3 billion takeover bid for Farmers Group Inc. is a little-used law that is likely to create obstacles for other companies seeking to do business in the state, regulators and lawyers said today.

headline.main: Company News; California Rule Raises Questions

byline.original: By ANDREA ADELSON, Special to the New York Times
